## createObservableAdaptor variable

Constructs an adaptor around an existing observable. This helps for cross frame access to observables.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createObservableAdaptor: <T>(aSrc: Subscribable<T>) => InteropObservable<T>
```
